content: the national wwii museum is proud to launch its own **knit your bit** campaign you can help the museum honor wwii veterans by knitting your bit - in this case a simple but cozy scarf to be donated to a veteran in a veterans center somewhere in the united states direct pdf download v for victory scarf 1 1 http //www nationalww2museum org/assets/pdfs/2007-scarf-pattern-crochet pdf
